name: Schizophrenia Demo
description:
You woke up in the middle of the night to a strange rumbling and noise , but what could it be? Is everything all right with your mind? ()_()

Thank you for your attention, I am waiting for your feedback and possible bug reports , I will be happy to receive any criticism.

If the blog is published, I will be able to notify you about future updates , my goal is to complete the demo version and release 1.0 , and then there will be a very interesting continuation of the story
